attributes.action:
Support the traditional Fish & Chip industry! 
Reduce the VAT on Fish & Chips!
attributes.additional_details:
Because if you don’t, you won’t have any fish and chip shops left.
At-risk within 12 months
~33% (~3,500 shops)

Industry Pressure
Ingredient cost hikes
Sunflower oil: +60%–77%)  
Cod & haddock: +75% increase  
Potatoes: +30%–300% ( 
Packaging: +38%–45%  
Energy costs
Gas & electricity doubled or worse, operational margins squeezed  
Fishing fleets also hit by fuel – fish supply viability threatened ()
Tax & wage inflation
Minimum wage hikes & potential return to 20% VAT  

THATS  WHY!
attributes.background:
I would like parliament to understand the detrimental hit the industry is having, due to the extreme vat, electric, gas, fish industry, potatoes/farming, rising wages. 

Yet we are expected to somehow create more money to pay the VAT BILL!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: 

Eliminate VAT on hot takeaway food
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725467
